isha_794745|Biryani|Basmati rice, mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, beans, cauliflower), onions, tomatoes, ginger-garlic paste, yogurt, mint leaves, coriander leaves, green chilies, lemon juice, biryani masala, turmeric, saffron, ghee, salt, oil|A fragrant and flavorful Indian rice dish where basmati rice is cooked with mixed vegetables, aromatic spices, and herbs. The vegetables are lightly saut√©ed and layered with partially cooked rice, then slow-cooked (dum style) to allow the flavors to blend. Served hot, garnished with fried onions, fresh coriander, and a squeeze of lemon, it makes a complete and satisfying meal.|Lunch
shweta_20fe00|Paneer Butter Masala Recipe|aneer, Onion, Tomato, Ginger-garlic paste, Cashew nuts, Butter, Cream, Red chili powder, Turmeric powder, Garam masala, Kasuri methi, Sugar, Salt, Oil, Water|Paneer Butter Masala is a rich and creamy North Indian dish made with soft paneer cubes cooked in a buttery tomato and cashew-based gravy. It is mildly spiced with garam masala, red chili, and kasuri methi, giving it a flavorful and aromatic taste. The dish is finished with fresh cream and butter for a smooth, luscious texture. It pairs perfectly with naan, roti, or steamed rice for a comforting meal.|lunch
